Transcendent Design: White-pink holographic UI (#FF69B4, #FFFFFF0F) with 120fps animations and glassmorphic bubbles. Surpasses Tesla Cybertruck minimalism with dynamic, futuristic flair.
Sovereign Offline: All ops (chat, voice, file, audit) run locally via Drift/SQLite. No cloud, no leaks.
Domain Purity: Core/DeFi schemas enforce strict input validation, preventing drift.
Audit Ritual: One-tap verify checks Lex Library integrity per domain.
Gemini/Grok Superiority: Real-time chat, voice (STT/TTS), file upload, auditable history - all signed, deterministic.
